mapper.select: SELECT EMP_NO , EMP_NAME , PHONE ,(SELECT dept_name FROM department dept WHERE dept.dept_no=emp.dept_no) DEPT_NM ,(SELECT job_name FROM job dept WHERE dept.job_no=emp.job_no) JOB_NM ,(SELECT left_count FROM employee_holiday empho WHERE empho.emp_no=emp.emp_no and empho.birth_year=EXTRACT(YEAR from sysdate)) LEFT_COUNT FROM employee emp order by EMP_NO

SELECT TO_CHAR(a.req_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') REQ_DATE_str , to_char(a.hd_start,'YYYY-MM-DD') HD_START_str , to_char(a.hd_end, 'YYYY-MM-DD') HD_END_str , a.hd_count HD_COUNT ,a.ea_no HD_REASON ,(b.total - sum(a.hd_count) over(order by a.hd_start) )as LEFT_COUNT
from holiday_history a, employee_holiday b
WHERE a.emp_no = b.emp_no AND a.emp_no=#{id} and to_char(a.hd_start,'YYYY')=#{birthYear} AND b.birth_year =#{birthYear} ORDER BY A.HD_START , A.HD_END
